thread.title: Adele's 'Hello' video already has an incredible 50 million views on YouTube
thread.title_full: Adele's 'Hello' video already has an incredible 50 million views on YouTube

title: Adele's 'Hello' video already has an incredible 50 million views on YouTube
text: Sunday, Oct 25 2015, 17:12 GMT Share on Facebook Share on Twitter Share on Google+ Adele may have only debuted her latest single 'Hello' on Friday (October 23), but its video has already amassed over 50 million views on YouTube.To put that in perspective, that equates to around a million plays an hour. Not too shabby. 11 things we learnt from Adele's zillion interviews today, from Lionel Richie to dog poo 'Hello' is the first single to be released from Adele's upcoming third album, 25 , which arrives on November 20.The six-minute visual, shot by Xavier Dolan, sees some impressive acting from Adele as she sings to a lost love.Although we're betting quite a few of those 50m-plus views were from curious fans wanting to check out THAT flip phone . What do you think of Adele's new single 'Hello'? Vote in our poll below.
